name: Colossal Spirits (Based on Titan Souls) (Mr_Seiun)
description:
Colossal Spirits is first game jam game; I'm really happy how it came out. It's based on Titan Souls Bow and Arrow mechanic in 3D where the player only has one array which they draw back to them.

The controls are on the games start Screen.

Hope you enjoy my game and please tell me what you think. Thanks you.
